title: A Jolly Good Fellow
logline: A forcibly retired Georgia deputy discovers a wildfire is cover for a meth-and-arson ring run by his estranged son, forcing him to choose between blood and justice as the town burns.
content: Read the screenplay: A Jolly Good Fellow

title: Mayfly
logline: A pill-addicted ex-cop returns to his swampy hometown and uncovers a mayfly-worshipping cult that drowns victims every seven years—unless he breaks the cycle and saves a ten-year-old girl.

title: World War Mars
logline: On war-torn Mars, a battle-numbed grunt and an enslaved teen supersoldier discover their forever-war is a corporate price-fixing scam and ignite a worker revolt while orbital lasers count down to erase them.
content: Read the screenplay: World War Mars

title: Alone
logline: Summoned home by her brother’s “suicide,” a guilt-ridden journalist confronts a parasitic spirit that drives lonely townsfolk to self-destruction—and threatens to expose the childhood murder she buried.

title: ASIP: The Gang Goes to Hell
logline: Mac locks the Gang in Paddy’s—re-themed as a Seven Deadly Sins hell-maze—proving eternal damnation is nothing compared with five narcissists trapped together.
content: Read the screenplay: ASIP: The Gang Goes to Hell

title: The Midnight Zone
logline: A rescue crew diving for a vanished oil-rig team finds an abyssal craft whose biomech field warps time and memory, pitting them against a corporate clean-up squad—and their own unraveling minds.
content: Read the screenplay: The Midnight Zone

title: Full Moon
logline: During the first lunar landing in 50 years, a medic mutates into a were-wolf under a blue super-moon, trapping six astronauts inside the base while corporate brass block any rescue.

title: The Mirror Program
logline: A Delta Force commando returns home to find a perfect bio-clone has replaced him, triggering a lethal showdown with the Pentagon’s “Mirror” program that grows soldiers to finish missions without consent.
content: Read the screenplay: The Mirror Program

title: Half Life
logline: In 1991 Moscow, a grieving physicist must stop his power-mad uncle from resurrecting Stalin through a WWII-era afterlife portal—while rescuing his daughter and confronting the wife he lost inside the void.
